Package sait.bms.managers

Class Manager

java.lang.Object
sait.bms.managers.Manager
public class Manager
extends java.lang.Object
Manager class to display the following: Checkout books Find books by title Display books by type of book Persist changes to books.txt
Version:
4 June 2021
Author:
Dongyeon Kim, SeungJin Moon, Yoonju Baek
